snippet: After racing, and losing to, Hamilton when they were children, and after finishing second to him in the drivers’ competition the past two seasons, Rosberg finally came out on top....
abstract: Nico Rosberg wins 2016 world drivers' championship, despite finishing second to Lewis Hamilton in Abu Dhabi Grand Prix; two men have had longstanding rivalry, and Rosberg's victory comes after two years of conceding title to Hamilton.
lead_paragraph: After racing, and losing to, Hamilton when they were children, and after finishing second to him in the drivers’ competition the past two seasons, Rosberg finally came out on top.

headline.main: Nico Rosberg Takes Formula One Drivers’ Title Despite Lewis Hamilton’s Win in Abu Dhabi
headline.print_headline: Formula One’s Rosberg Finally Gets the Better of a Lifelong Adversary

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Mercedes GP Petronas Formula One Team
